cz.agents.alite.vis.layer.terminal
Class TerminalLayer

java.lang.Object
  cz.agents.alite.vis.layer.AbstractLayer
      cz.agents.alite.vis.layer.terminal.TerminalLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
VisLayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleLayer, ImageLayer, LineLayer, PointLayer, SpriteLayer
public abstract class TerminalLayer
extends AbstractLayer

The TerminalLayers draw various visual elements on the canvas of Vis singleton. The particular TerminalLayers copies the structure of the visual Elements. A terminal layer (if ever) has only one factory method create(). This method, by convention, has only one parameter, which is the aggregated version of an element interface, which the layer can draw. For instance, The create() method of the PointLayer, has one parameter of type PointElements, which is a aggregated version of the Point element definition interface.

Author:
Antonin Komenda
